paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStore main classes are grouped into 2 main layers:

list.item:
The
10_interface_layer/index.xml interface layer provides a high-level, unique interface for every DBMS.

The
20_implementation_layer/index.xml implementation layer customizes high-level routines to various DBMS handles.

paragraph.paragraph: Other cluster can facilitate your database management:

list.item:
The
30_data_structures_generation/index.xml generation cluster , with the EiffelStore wizard, generates a facilitated and dynamic interface with your database.

The
40_dataview_cluster/index.xml dataview cluster lets you create a customized database GUI.
